rpc.util
Class PrologUtil

java.lang.Object
  rpc.util.PrologUtil

public class PrologUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that provides auxiliary methods dealing with and communicating with Prolog.

Constructor Detail

PrologUtil

public PrologUtil()
Method Detail

termToList

public static java.util.List<SchemaItem> termToList(jpl.Term term)
Constructs a list of schema items out the JPL representation of a list (i.e., a nested compound). Adds the change to a cache.

Parameters:
term - the JPL term to transform.
Returns:
a list of schema items that was embedded in the JPL term.

fixHyphen

public static jpl.Term fixHyphen(jpl.Term term)
Constructs a new JPL term from a given term by changing minus functors back to hyphens in names of atoms.

Parameters:
term - the JPL term to fix.
Returns:
a new JPL term with the hyphen appropriately embedded in the name.

resetCache

public static void resetCache()
Empties the cache that maps terms to lists of schema items.
